Summary: General Dynamics: 2 bills analyzed; 48 direct/indirect impacts. Key subsidies: $4.6B, $5.4B, $750M. High direct risk (0.953), full indirect exposure. Overall risk: critical.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $4,600,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "$4,600,000,000 for a second Virginia-class submarine in fiscal year 2026;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $5,400,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "$5,400,000,000 for two additional Guided Missile Destroyer (DDG) ships;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $750,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$750,000,000 for additional supplier development across the naval shipbuilding industrial base;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $250,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$250,000,000 for additional advanced manufacturing processes across the naval shipbuilding industrial base;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $500,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$500,000,000 for additional dry-dock capability;"
